entry.def: A teardrop is a large tear that comes from your eye when you are crying quietly.

means.word_mean: 1. anything shaped like a falling drop (as a pendant gem on an earring)
2. a drop of the clear salty saline solution secreted by the lacrimal glands;

sentences.sentence: "his story brought tears to her eyes"
